scripts.release:check: yarn test --run && node scripts/check_supabase_from_allowlist.mjs && node scripts/check_postgrest_from_allowlist.mjs && node scripts/check_no_direct_financeiro_tables.mjs && yarn check:any-budget && VITE_LOCAL_BILLING_BYPASS=true VITE_LOCAL_PLAN_SLUG=SCALE yarn test:e2e:gate:all && yarn verify:migrations
scripts.release:check:ci: yarn test --run && node scripts/check_supabase_from_allowlist.mjs && node scripts/check_postgrest_from_allowlist.mjs && node scripts/check_no_direct_financeiro_tables.mjs && yarn check:any-budget && VITE_LOCAL_BILLING_BYPASS=true VITE_LOCAL_PLAN_SLUG=SCALE yarn test:e2e:gate:all
scripts.verify:migrations: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; trap "supabase stop" EXIT; bash scripts/ci_supabase_start_db_only.sh; supabase db reset --local --no-seed --yes; LOCAL_DB_URL="postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:54322/postgres"; psql "$LOCAL_DB_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -X -qAt -f scripts/rg01_db_asserts.sql'
scripts.verify:migrations:rg03: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; trap "supabase stop" EXIT; bash scripts/ci_supabase_start_db_only.sh; supabase db reset --local --no-seed --yes; LOCAL_DB_URL="postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:54322/postgres"; psql "$LOCAL_DB_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -X -qAt -f scripts/rg03_db_asserts.sql'
